availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William C. Drake (Trimble County, KY, farmer )

body.p: Trimble County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Emily Brackett Drake in Trimble County, Kentucky in September 1838. Father of Sarah Drake, Emily Drake, Joseph Drake, James Drake, Martha Drake, Elisabeth Drake, and William Drake. Farmer in Trimble County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Trimble County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, District 1, p. 404A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, p. 221.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Trimble County Marriages, Film #000420387, p. 399.
